org.drip.quant.distribution

Class Univariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.distribution.Univariate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnivariateNormal

    public abstract class Univariate
extends java.lang.Object
    Univariate implements the base abstract class behind univariate distributions. It exports methods for incremental, cumulative, and inverse cumulative distribution densities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Univariate() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double cumulative(double dblX)
      Compute the cumulative under the distribution to the given value
      abstract double incremental(double dblXLeft, double dblXRight)
      Compute the incremental under the distribution between the 2 variates
      abstract double invCumulative(double dblX)
      Compute the inverse cumulative under the distribution corresponding to the given value
